ygData.subject: Two Sparks are better than one.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine awoke inside a cr chamber still attached to Shadow Wing, was he delusional or hadn t the whole thing happened? His answer came as he saw her body

Subject: Two Sparks are better than one.

Lunarpine awoke inside a cr chamber still attached to Shadow Wing, 
was he delusional or hadn't the whole thing happened? His answer came 
as he saw her body glow through one of her wounds he saw the bright 
glow of her spark forming. He pulled the wound open a little and the 
spark exited and floated before him.

Lunarpine extended his hand, the spark seemed to read his thoughts 
and landed in it. The wolfbot removed the wire attached to her 
lifeless body and touched it to the spark. It glowed more brightly, 
He could feel it's power circulating through him. He looked down at 
the hole he'd ripped in himself. the spark again seemed to read his 
thoughts and hovered down to the wound. Gently he nudged it inside. 

He thought back to thier sparring sessions, his words were clear as 
if he'd only said them moments ago. "If you can't protect your spark 
then I'll do it for you." He'd made her a promise and he'd keep it or 
face the pit for his failure.
